pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - HotSpot Heaters | Your Privacy Matters to Us +91-984-8522003 hotspot@gmail.com Alkapuri X Roads(Uppal), LB Nagar - Uppal Rd, Sai Nagar, Nagole, Hyderabad, Telangana 500068, India HotSpot Home Advantages About Us Why are we Premium The perfect heater Privacy Policy Data Retention We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. We will delete or anonymize your information when it is no longer needed. Cross-Border Data Transfers We may transfer your personal information to countries outside of India for the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. When we do so, we will take appropriate measures to ensure that your information is protected in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites that are not owned or controlled by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these websites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of these websites before providing any personal information. Information We Collect When you interact with our website or make a purchase, we may collect the following information from you: Personal information, such as your name, email address, phone number, and shipping address Payment information, such as credit card details or bank account information Order history and purchase behavior Device information, such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system Usage information, such as the pages you visit on our website and the products you view or purchase How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect from you for the following purposes: To process and fulfill your orders for our products To communicate with you about your orders and deliveries To send you marketing communications, such as newsletters and promotional offers, if you have opted in to receive them To personalize your experience on our website and provide you with targeted advertising To improve our website and products based on your feedback and usage patterns To administer our website, including troubleshooting, data analysis, testing, research, and statistical purposes To keep our website secure and prevent fraud Your Rights You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information that we have collected. You can also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time. To exercise these rights, please contact us at hotspot@gmail.com. pages.thanks: Thank You - HotSpot Heaters | Appreciation for Your Trust and Support Thank You for Reaching Out! We appreciate you taking the time to connect with us here at HotSpot. Your thoughts and inquiries are valuable, and we're always excited to hear from our community. Rest assured that your message has been received and is currently being reviewed by our dedicated team.
